description: Substantial research project focusing on a particular area of computer science. Year-long project culminates with a written thesis & presention of poster. Students commencing in sem 1 enrol in COMP7801 for Sem 1 & 2; students commencing in sem 2 enrol in COMP7802 for sem 2 & the following sem 1.
incompatible: COMP6801 or COMP6802 or COMP7805 or COMP7806 or COMP7807
